hints.content:
First, let's fill in $\purpleD{700}+\blueE{50}+\maroonD6$ on the place value chart.

$\begin{align}
\purpleD{700} &= \purpleD{7}\text{ hundreds}\\\\
\blueE{50} &= \blueE{5}\text{ tens}\\\\
\maroonD{6} &= \maroonD{6}\text{ ones}
\end{align}$


Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\purpleD{7}$ | $\blueE5$ | $\maroonD6$

Now, let's say the number $\purpleD7\blueE5\maroonD6$ out loud and write it in written form.

$\purpleD{\text{seven hundred}}\blueE{\text{ fifty-}}\maroonD{\text{six}}$

Here is the completed chart:

Number Form | Word Form | Expanded Form
- | - | -
$756$ | Seven hundred fifty-six | ${700}+{50}+6$

question.content:
**Complete the chart.**

Number Form | Word Form | Expanded Form
- | - | -
[[☃ dropdown 1]] | [[☃ dropdown 2]] | $700 + 50 + 6$
